channel.title: Need some Client Help [Rep]
channel.description:
Offering some reputation for anyone who can help me find fix to the current 2 issues with my client.
First one, this happens in chat, however to other members it shows fine but on your own screen it doesn't show properly. http://screensnapr.com/v/kMG86o.jpg
Second one is that I have some white objects in my client, Wooden doors and ladders etc.
If you can help me comment below, thank you.

@iiTzSkillz wrote:

I think the white objects is a problem with the sprites not sure though…
